alert.note: Alert for Adair; Chariton; Linn; Macon; Randolph; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 12:21AM CDT until July 01 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Adair County in northeastern Missouri... Northern Randolph County in north central Missouri... Northern Chariton County in north central Missouri... Linn County in north central Missouri... Southeastern Sullivan County in north central Missouri... Macon County in north central Missouri... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1221 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Browning to near Marceline, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kirksville, Macon, Brookfield, Marceline, La Plata, Bevier, Bucklin, Atlanta, Laclede, Callao, Linneus, Brashear, Browning, New Cambria, Purdin, Mendon, Jacksonville, Gibbs, Rothville and Millard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Chariton; Linn; Macon; Randolph; Sullivan
